text: I want to install OSQA on a local Windows system.
I've downloaded bitnami-djangostack-1.1.1-2-windows-installer.exe, which has django, python, mysql and apache built in.
I've run a django example given on the django website and it's working fine.
But I'm confused how to install OSAQ.
I've downloaded the source code from the OSQA site and read the installation instructions (it requires django 1.1.1), but I can't make it work.
